question_text: In this contact, you will be asked up to four questions. Please check the answers that best describe your oral health behavior.
Did you brush your teeth two days ago?
How many times did you brush your teeth two days ago?
At approximately what time did you first brush your teeth two days ago?
For how long, in minutes and seconds, did you first brush your teeth two days ago?
Thank you for answering this Survey. Please click "FINISH".
